price: Dájúdájú al-Ƙur’ān ni ọ̀rọ̀ (tí A fi rán) Òjíṣẹ́, alápọ̀n-ọ́nlé.¹
footnotes: 1. “Ọ̀rọ̀ òjíṣẹ́” ni ìtúmọ̀ “ƙọolu rọsūl, àmọ́ al-Ƙur’ān kì í ṣe ọ̀rọ̀ Òjíṣẹ́ bí kò ṣe “Ọ̀rọ̀ Allāhu”. Àgbékalẹ̀ irúfẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀ yìí ni ṣíṣe àfitì ọ̀rọ̀ sí ọ̀dọ̀ alágbàsọ. Bákan náà, āyah yìí jọ āyah 19 nínú sūrah at-Tẹkwīr ní ìsọ, àmọ “Òjíṣẹ́” tí wọ́n gbàlérò nínú āyah ti sūrah al-Hāƙƙọh ni Òjíṣẹ́ abara, ìyẹn Ànábì wa Muhammad - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a -, Òjíṣẹ́ mọlāika ni wọ́n sì gbàlérò nínú āyah ti sūrah at-Tẹkwīr. Sàkánì ti ìkọ̀ọ̀kan ti jẹyọ l’ó ṣàfi hàn èyí bẹ́ẹ̀.
